quest.name: Tea Time
journal:
 Quest Sync
Vondia has tea to brew, but no ingredients to do so.
objectives: Use the preserving agent on tea mushrooms.
Deliver the treated tea mushrooms to Vondia.

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: Excuse me, misssir. You are one of the visitors from the Crystarium, yes? I realize this is sudden, but may I ask you to gather something for me when next you venture into the woods?

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: I am to hold a tea ceremony on the morrowthis afternoonthis evening, but only now remembered I have depleted my store of tea mushrooms.

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: I have not much, but I will see you duly compensated for your troubles.

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: They can be found to the south in the Citia Swamps. But before you go, you will need this─a preserving agent for the mushrooms. They are quite delicate, and prone to releasing their spores prematurely without it.

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: If you could gather five, that will be more than enough.

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: Remember to use the preserving agent before you pick them.

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: I pray you had no trouble finding the mushrooms?

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: They contain an ever-so-slight amount of poison, you know. Not enough to cause adverse effects, mind you, but over time one can build an immunity to similar toxins.

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: Would you care for a cup? It's the least I can do. ...No?

dialogue.name: VONDIA
dialogue.text: Well, if you should change your mind, I would be more than willing to prepare some for you.
